ygData.subject: Illusions - Observations, needs conformation
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, I read the post below about our 32nd level friend taking on a level 40 MOB by using the illusion Fire elemental and was hitting for 80+ points.  I have
ygData.messageBody:
Hail,
I read the post below about our 32nd level friend taking on a level 40 MOB
by using the illusion "Fire elemental" and was hitting for 80+ points. I
have also noticed that when I cast the illusion Human ( I am a High Elf ) I
lose my ability to see in the dark. With these observations in hand, am I
right to assume that we gain the abilities of our illusion as well? I am
curious to know if my Wood-elf illusion will give me the ability to
"forage". It may be far fetched, but I have not seen anything being
discussed on this matter anywhere, 'cept for the brief mention of being a
Fire elemental. Any input and thoughts on this matter would be greatly
appreciated.

I am
Tovan
Felwithe Enchanter of the 3rd rank.
Rathe Lake
